div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 710 Thasos: ?, before 1912 Burial: c. 400 B.C. (T) Contents: 27+ AR. Hoard? Thasos: dr. Disposition: Egger Jan. 15, 1912, nos. 169- 194, 207 This lot of 27 dr. in the Egger Sale gives every appearance of being part of a hd. Possibly the later dr. (nos. 195- 202) also have a hd. context
